attributes.action: regulate exorbitant booking fees for concert and theatre tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many venues now sell tickets exclusively through agencies who add a booking fee to the actual cost, as well as then charging you to print your own ticket. This can often be an additional 10% PER TICKET, regardless of how many are purchased. The credit card companies charge around 1.5%, which is acceptable, but this rip-off is unfair and prevents many people from booking. The admin charge is no more for a £90 ticket than a £25 one, so why the ridiculous increase? To charge you for printing your own ticket is also another means of making money at the expense of the purchaser. This needs to be controlled now.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition live that you may wish to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/bookingfee/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
